adrFormatAddress: 1095 6th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Watch shop stocking high-end timepieces from recognizable brands, including some pre-owned.

originalText.text:
I stopped in a few months ago to inquire about buying a new 2023 yellow gold Rolex GMT.

The ‚Äúsalesperson‚Äù Damian was very accommodating in person, and said I‚Äôd be first on the imaginary ‚Äúlist‚Äù for if/when they received the piece I wanted to buy. I left with his contact info and a little tiny bit of optimism.

I emailed a few days later, just a quick ‚Äúnice to meet you‚Äù. No response. I texted the same. No response. I sent a follow up email a few weeks later. No response. Another text. No response.

Congratulations - you lost yourself a $40,000 sale. I went elsewhere and had the watch sourced within two days.

My advice: you‚Äôll save yourself a lot of time, frustration and money by simply taking your business elsewhere.

Even a tiny little bit of customer service would‚Äôve been greatly appreciated.

UPDATE: I wrote this review a month ago and still there‚Äôs been no attempt to follow up, apologize or otherwise rectify the situation. So I‚Äôve edited my review to name names.

originalText.text: My husband and I had the pleasure of working with Damian and also Leslie who were so patient and took the time to walk us through the fine details of each watch we were interested in. Damian helped us with buying a Datejust for a milestone birthday as well as an Air king last year. (We‚Äôve been looking for a particular datejust since 2022). After several months of waiting, we were lucky enough to be offered a submariner date as well! This location has a great selection of watches from different brands - for those looking for a  new Rolex, be patient as stock isn‚Äôt always available! This is one of the best locations in NYC with amazing and knowledgeable associates. As with anywhere you have to spend the time to build a relationship!

originalText.text:
Amazing options of all kinds. Though was not very secure. In England we have to ring a bell as here anyone can walk through the shop
Great variety of watchd: Tudo, Cartier-Bresson, longiness and a wide selection of Rolex. A young  dark skin member of staff was particularly nice to me.

originalText.text:
My greatest watch experience so far, thanks to all the choice you have between new and certified pre-owned watches, but most importantly for me, the knowledge, care and time taken by their staff, especially Damian! It's rare to see someone being as professional with people who took many days to even decide if they were going to purchase a watch. Thanks to Bucherer and the time taken by Damian, I got to find the perfect watch for me and that will remembered everytime I wear it!
Thank you so much üòâ

originalText.text: For my first luxury watch buying experience I really appreciated the level of customer care and attention provided by the professionals at Bucherer Bryant Park. I worked with Klaus to narrow down the model of pre-owned Rolex I wanted, and then was able to choose between several pieces to ensure I was getting the best one available. Every step of the way there was ample communication and helpful guidance from these watch experts. Thank you again!
